explains: adj. 固定的；沉着的；沉静的；古板的，保守的

sentences.en: Dear me, how long I have staid!
If you don't, you become staid, and your customers get tired.
sentences.cn: 如果不这么做，你就会变得古板保守，那么你的顾客就会感到厌倦。

sentences.en: Competition is forcing once-staid publications to spice up their content.
sentences.cn: 竞争迫使一度严肃的报刊增加“猛料”提高内容的趣味性。
